summary: A young girl finds a mysterious scale belonging to the missing Zodiac Dragon. With the help of the remaining zodiac animals, she sets off on a quest to find the missing dragon, return the scale and restore peace to the Earth.
cast: Star Noorbakhsh|Maryevelyn Jones|Maggie Chiang|Leon Dai|Justin Garton|Zhe Gong|Alicia Hayes|Fish Leong|Shao Chun Qu|Rick Vyper|Leehom Wang|Michael Wong|Jiru Wu|Ziyi Zhang
title: Long zai na li
